title: Extended Retro-Slab?
content:
Can anyone identify this one? I have been seeing it everywhere.

 [‹ Font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203155919/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39298 "Go to previous forum topic") [Thick slabs of winsome retro geometry - Futura Display (Florian) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203155919/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39188 "Go to next forum topic")
author: julia.warren

comments.content: I’m going to toss out a blind guess based on the topic title alone: [Hellenic Wide](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203155919/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000096)?

\> I’m going to toss out a blind guess based on the topic title alone: Hellenic Wide?

:-D
